long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reach your North Star with Startbeat, the journal for teams that shows everyone the bigger picture.

Startbeat is a new start page that acts as a journal for your teams. It collects and distributes updates across individuals and teams. 

Show everyone the bigger picture easily. 

Let everyone show their contribution equally.

Celebrate key moments collectively.

Detect difficulties effectively.
